medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Shortness of breath has been ongoing for 2 weeks and has been getting worse, initially requiring 2 pillows at night but now requiring 5 pillows. RUQ pain has been ongoing for several days, initially associated with food but is now constant. The patient also reports early satiety, intermittent constipation and diarrhea, and nausea without vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Severe mitral regurgitation status post mechanical mitral valve replacement, atrial fibrillation status post direct current cardioversion, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, type 2 diabetes, hyperthyroidism, anxiety, asthma, congestive heart failure with EF 43%, gastroesophageal reflux disease.
medical_history.family_history: Family history is significant for a brother with coronary artery disease and a grandmother who died of coronary artery disease; there is a reported family history of hypertension.
